page.title: 11RECREATION & GAMES
page.content: Recreation and Games Hospital Tig 1. You need at least six people. 2. One person is a catcher. 3. The person that is the catcher has to try and catch somebody. 4. The person that is caught has to hold were he is caught. 5. When you are caught three times you are the catcher. Foxy 1.One person stands facing the wall. 2.You need at least five people. 3.The person who is on has to turn round and the rest have to walk up to the wall. If the person who is on sees you you have to stand at the wall. 4.If one of the people can get to you they shout Foxy! and the people run back. If you're caught you're on.
